title: WATCH: Stenson's water shocker!
text:
Henrik Stenson hacks out of the water with no shoes on at Bay Hill   8:55pm Watch Henrik Stenson hack out of the water during a frustrating second round at Bay Hill Henrik Stenson needed several attempts to get out of the water after a hole to forget during the second round of the Arnold Palmer Invitational. 
A day on from Cody Gribble sending an alligator back into the water , Stenson had to head in to the hazard himself after a stray approach at the par-four 11th. 
The Swede didn't need to strip to his underwear like he famously did at the 2009 WGC-Cadillac Championship, but did roll up his trousers and wade bare-footed into the water at Bay Hill. Stenson has finished in the top-10 in each of his last seven worldwide starts 
With his ball almost entirely submerged in the hazard, Stenson's first attempt to find dry land caught the slope and stopped on a mound just short of the lake. 
Stenson then needed two further hacks to get out of the water, before pitching to three feet from the rough and nudging in the putt for a triple-bogey seven. Live PGA Tour Golf
